Subject: WhatsApp - uploaded shadow copy enabled
Description: We have used shadow copy and retrieved all the copies, but we were unable to find the shadow copy of the file uploaded to WhatsApp.
What_We_Know__c:
In our remote session we observed that the file shadows for the WhatsApp Desktop application are able to download after we disabled the File Shadows Repository ( Externalize File Shadows ) as shown in the below screenshot.

The customer agreed to test and observe the behavior over the next coming days and then update us with feedback.
Next_Steps__c: The customer agreed to test and observe the behavior over the next coming days and then update us with feedback.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer said we are getting the logs of WhatsApp desktop application you can close the case.
